systems.name: Bromothymol Blue
systems.labNotes: Yellow (acidic form) ⇌ Blue (basic form). Green at neutral pH. Changes with addition of HCl or NaOH.

systems.name: Iron Thiocyanate
systems.labNotes: Pale yellow ⇌ Blood red. Adding Fe³⁺ or SCN⁻ shifts toward red FeSCN²⁺ complex. Phosphate ions remove Fe³⁺.

systems.name: Copper Ammine
systems.labNotes: Blue-green aqua complex ⇌ Deep blue ammine complex. HCl removes NH₃ (shifts left). Adding NH₃ shifts right.

systems.name: Copper Aqua-Chloro
systems.labNotes: Blue-green aqua complex ⇌ Green chloro complex. HCl adds Cl⁻ (shifts right). Water dilutes (shifts left).

systems.name: Cobalt Aqua-Chloro
systems.labNotes: Pink aqua complex ⇌ Blue chloro complex. Endothermic: heat shifts right (blue), cold shifts left (pink). NaCl or acetone shifts right.

systems.name: Carbon Dioxide in Water
systems.labNotes: CO₂ dissolves to form carbonic acid (acidic, yellow indicator) ⇌ Carbonate/bicarbonate ions (basic, pink indicator). Pressure increases dissolution.
